      • Entity

        public Entity​(float x,
              float y,
              int width,
              int height,
              float maxSpeed,
              float accelerationRate,
              int radius)
        Simple constructor with position, maximum speed and acceleration rate
        Parameters:
        x - initial x position of the entity
        y - initial y position of the entity
        height - the height of the entity
        width - the width of the entity
        maxSpeed - maximum speed of the entity
        accelerationRate - acceleration factor of the entity
        radius - the hitbox radius
